titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony of Senate employees.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/22/1993--Introduced. Authorizes Lula Rodriguez, and any other Senate employee whose testimony is required, to testify in Pefaur v. Pefaur, except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted.
